unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my MBBS at AIIMS. My anxiety was through the roof. Then, a friend suggested a mental health app. It was surprisingly helpful! Like, a real "3 Idiots" solution! It reminded me of my yoga classes near Marine Drive. It helped me track my mood and even offered guided meditation in Hindi. Definitely a useful tool!
